  • public class lightCorrector
extends java.lang.Object

      int type that stores the speed of the robot in lightCorrection
      private EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor
      EV3LargeRegulatedMotor type that stores the left wheel motor information
      (package private) double lightSensorDist
      double type that holds the distance to compensate for the distance from the wheelbase to the lightSensor

      Navigation type that stores navigation related information
      private Odometer odo
      Odometer type that stores odometer related information

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void correct()
      method that activates black line scanning when it is called with several Thread.sleep calls.
      void fireCorrect()
      method that activates black line scanning when it is near the firing line.
      void travelCorrect()
      method that activates black line scanning when it is called without making the robot sleep(Thread.sleep)

    • Constructor Detail

      • lightCorrector

        public lightCorrector(Odometer odo,
                      Navigation navi,
                      SampleProvider colorSensorRight,
                      float[] colorDataRight,
                      SampleProvider colorSensorLeft,
                      float[] colorDataLeft)
        Parameters:
        odo - odometer values are passed thourgh Odometer type
        navi - navigation values are passed though Navigation type
        colorSensorRight - right light sensor general initial information is passed through SampleProvider type
        colorDataRight - right light sensor fetching values are passed through float[] type
        colorSensorLeft - left light sensor general initial information is passed through SampleProvider type
        colorDataLeft - left light sensor fetching values are passed through float[] type

    • Method Detail

      • correct

        public void correct()
        method that activates black line scanning when it is called with several Thread.sleep calls. The robot goes forward until a black line is seen. The two light sensor threads starts and waits for the two to end

      • travelCorrect

        public void travelCorrect()
        method that activates black line scanning when it is called without making the robot sleep(Thread.sleep)

      • fireCorrect

        public void fireCorrect()
        method that activates black line scanning when it is near the firing line. In addition to other correction methods, the robot goes backwards to correct its heading then goes forward
